subject: Sexual Health
title: Egg Freezing
description: A micro-lesson that makes Egg Freezing usable.

hook.text: Freezing eggs pauses the biological clock, preserving fertility potential for years or even decades.

buildup.text: The process uses the same hormone stimulation and retrieval as IVF, but eggs are frozen instead of fertilized.

discovery.text: Vitrification, a flash-freezing technique, prevents ice crystal damage and dramatically improved survival rates.

twist.text: Age at freezing matters most. Eggs frozen at 30 have far better outcomes than those frozen at 38.

climax.text: Egg freezing gives women reproductive autonomy, decoupling fertility from the pressure of age alone.

punchline.text: Freeze time for your eggs. Decide when you're ready.

quiz.question: What technique improved egg freezing success rates?
